Name: Reunification War
Details: The Reunification War of 2577-2597, was the first interstellar war backed by the entire Star League. The Inner Sphere, all four House and the Star League, had a vested interest in controlling the Periphery. The comforts of the Innersphere were meaningless to a peoples who left the Inner Sphere (and the I.S. amenities) in favor of family and freedom. The Inner Sphere disagreed.
